amendatorysection.para: Examinations shall be given at stated or called meetings of the board. The board shall adopt and publish the rules and regulations for the scope of the examinations and methods of procedure. The board shall file a report after the close of each examination showing the action of the board upon each application and each applicant shall be notified of the result of his or her examination. An applicant who fails an examination may apply for one reexamination at the next examination conducted by the board without payment of an additional fee. Applications for reexamination after a period of one year or subsequent reexaminations may be granted upon payment of a fee in an amount determined by the board.
